You will develop your people management skills through constant practicing and training.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You need to discuss with your direct manager/People Partner which of the people management processes you are going to be involved in. The list of your managerial responsibilities might vary, but there's a \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"set of core activities\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" that require your attention and support as a Resource Manager.
